short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple age calculator Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Age Calculator" is a simple and intuitive Chrome extension designed to calculate the exact age difference between two dates. Whether you need to calculate your age or find the difference between any two dates, this tool makes it easy. Just enter the old date and the new date, and it will provide the difference in years, months, and days. Perfect for quick age calculations without leaving your browser.
